name: Tworlds
description:
This game was developed under 48 hours as a part of United Game Jam. The theme for the game jam was 'Two'.

Tworlds stands for Two Worlds. Switch between the dark and light sides to complete a series of platformer puzzles.

Assets links - 

  1. Godot tutorial - https://github.com/GDQuest/godot-beginner-2d-platformer/releases/tag/1.1.0
  2. OpenGameArt.org - https://opengameart.org/
